actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the number of years during which the death tax under subtitle B of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is repealed should be extended, pending the permanent repeal of the death tax.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the number of years during which the death tax under subtitle B (Estate and Gift Taxes) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is repealed should be extended, pending the permanent repeal of the death tax.

titles.title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the number of years during which the death tax under subtitle B of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is repealed should be extended, pending the permanent repeal of the death tax.
